Lets compute a z-score:
```{python}
x = 521 
y = 32
mu = 4
sigma = 7
numerator = x-mu
z = numerator/sigma
print(z)
```

Here is some inline code evaluations using reticulate: x = `r py$x` and y = `r py$y` below:

$$
z = \frac{x-\mu}{\sigma} 
  = \frac{`r py$x`-`r py$mu`}{`r py$sigma`} 
  = \frac{`r py$numerator`}{`r py$sigma`} 
  = `r py$z`
$$
